property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Switch the damage and speed values of your attack. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the damage of the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take the top card of your deck and add it to your momentum. Only playable after you have played a reversal. R Commit, Discard 1 momentum: After you successfully block, you may play any kick attack in your hand as a Reversal with +1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, play any kick as a Reversal. Chun-Li R: After your opponent successfully plays an attack, partially block that attack, you may then play any kick as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add up to 2 attacks you played this turn to your hand. Discard 1 card. Chun-Li R Make a control check: After you decide to block an opponent's attack, play this card as either a high or low block with a block rating equal to the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets 'Stun: 2'. Not playable if this attack is played as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack can only be blocked by high blocks. E: The next copy of heel stomp you play this turn gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: This attack gets 'Multiple: X'. If this attack (or any copies of this attack created by its Multiple ability) is blocked, All other copies of this attack are discarded.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the next attack you play has a mid attack zone, it gets -1 difficulty. Chun-Li E: The next kick or throw attack you play this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack deals damage, discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is a kick attack that you could normally play, play that attack (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed. If you have another attack in your card pool with a speed of 5 or greater, this attack gets +2 damage as well.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack and All of its Multiple copies get +X damage. X equals the number of other attacks in your card pool (not counting Multiple copies of this attack).

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may not play this card as a Reversal after you have blocked a low attack. E: Your next {Air} attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Take 1 attack card with speed 5 or greater in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit your character card: This attack gets +1 speed. If this attack deals damage, discard it from your card pool. Chun-Li E: This attack gets +1 speed. If this attack deals damage, ready your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you fail a control check, your Combat Phase does not end. Clear your card pool and start a new Combat Phase. You may not play attacks for the rest of this turn. Only playable if your opponent has more foundations than you. Chun-Li R Commit, Discard 1 momentum: After you fail a control check for an {Air} card, you may make the check again.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed. If the attack was played as a Reversal, it gets +2 speed instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your kick attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy any number of your ready foundations: Your opponent discards X+1 cards. X equals the number of foundations destroyed. Only playable once per turn. R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an ability printed on their character, they discard 1 card

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose one of the following abilities: You and your opponent each draw a number of cards equal to your respective momentums or you and your opponent each discard a number of cards equal to your respective momentums. E Discard X cards from your momentum: Your attack gets 'Stun: X'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays a foundation or asset, if there are no attacks in their card pool, discard that foundation or asset. Dhalsim R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a card, if there are no attacks in their card pool, negate its effects and discard that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After a response ability is played, negate the effects of that response ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this attack if you have no other attacks in your card pool. E: If this attack deals damage, commit a number of your opponent's assets equal to the amount of damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this attack if you have no other attacks in your card pool. E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent must discard 1 card each time they play a card into their card pool for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, take up to 3 of your cards that have been removed from the game and add them to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent may not play response or enhance abilities for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: This attack is unblockable unless your opponent discards 1 card when they choose to block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: If this attack dealt damage, when you clear your card pool place it in your staging area with 2 Fire tokens on it. Each of your ready phases remove 1 Fire token and your opponent discards 2 cards. If at any time this card has no Fire tokens on it discard it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Choose 1 foundation. Abilities printed on copies of the chosen foundation may not be played this turn. Dhalsim E: Choose 1 card. Abilities printed on copies of the chosen card may not be played this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, take up to 3 cards in your discard pile and add them in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this turn, your opponent must discard 1 random card before they commit foundations to make a control check succeed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent must discard 2 cards unless they discard 1 momentum. Dhalsim E: Your opponent must discard 1 card unless they discard 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a non-attack card into their card pool, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Take 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Add the top card of your deck to your card pool face down: After your opponent plays an enhance ability, negate the effects of that ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {All} attack gets +2 speed. E Discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card. Only playable if you have an attack card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Reveal your hand to your opponent and then draw X cards. X equals the number of attack cards revealed. R Discard 1 momentum: When you are taking damage reduce that damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: The next punch attack you play this turn is unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +3 speed. Your opponent draws 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X cards: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards.

card.name: Hold for a Second Overhead Kick

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, you either draw 1 card or your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent chooses 1 of your momentum cards. Add the chosen card to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit X foundations: This attack gets +X speed. Only {All} or {Void} foundations may be commited to pay this ability's cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. Ken R: Before you add this card to your momentum during the End Phase, attach this card to your character instead. While attached, your character's hand size gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard 1 card: Your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.Ken E: Your next attack this turn gets +1 speed. Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed. Ken E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent loses 1 vitality. Only playable if you have more cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card and then discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +5 speed. Your opponent draws 4 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: You and your opponent each discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Any attack gets -1 damage (to a minimum of 1). If that attack deals damage to you, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Any attack gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you block an attack, draw 2 cards. E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If your attack deals damage, you gain 1 vitality. R: After you fail an attempt to play a block, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: When you are reduced to 0 or less vitality, you do not lose the game and are returned to 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 card: Search your deck for a card with equal or lesser difficulty than a card you already have in your card pool, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy any number of foundations you control: Draw 1 card for each foundation you destroyed for this ability's cost. Ryu F Destroy any number of foundations you control: Draw 1 card and gain 1 vitality for each foundation you destroyed for this ability's cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: If this attack deals damage, you gain 1 vitality and your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: If this attack is blocked, draw X cards. X cannot be greater than the damage of this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: For the rest of the turn when you gain vitality, gain 1 extra vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits 1 foundation.Ryu E Destroy 1 foundation: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: This attack gets -1 speed and -3 damage. If this attack deals damage, you gain 2 vitality.Ryu E Commit your character card: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Draw 1 card. Ryu R: Before you draw a card, this attack gets +2 damage instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this card as a block, you and your opponent each draw 2 cards. Only playable if the difficulty of the blocked attack is equal to or greater than this card's printed difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you gain 2 vitality. Ryu E: If this attack deals damage, you gain 3 vitality and this card's first ability cannot be played. Only playable if this card's first ability has not been played.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: Gain 2 vitality. Only playable if your opponent committed foundations due to this attack's Stun ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If this attack is blocked, you either draw 1 card or your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 3 foundations: After you block an attack, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your attack gets -1 speed and +3 damage. E Commit 1 foundation: If your attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard your hand and draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards you discarded. R Commit, Discard 1 momentum: After you resolve an attack, make a control check for that attack again. If successful, your opponent loses vitality equal to the printed damage of the attack and your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add this card to your card pool. While this card is in your card pool your attacks get +1 damage and any blocks you play get -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your next attack this turn is unblockable. Only playable if you have more cards in your staging area than your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After 1 of your attacks gets a speed or damage bonus, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After a player draws a card, any attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If you have 2 or more kick attacks in your card pool, this attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 3 foundations, Discard 3 momentum: This attack gets +8 damage. Sagat E: Discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: Your next attack this turn gets +2 damage. Only playable if you have drawn a card this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: This attack gets +X damage and 'Stun: X'. Any foundations committed by this attack's Stun ability are destroyed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: The next attack you play this turn gets -1 speed and +1 damage for every copy of this attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If you have 2 or more punch attacks in your card pool, this attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +1 damage. Sagat E: This attack gets 'Powerful: 6' instead of 'Powerful: 3'. Only playable if you have more cards in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card, discard 1 card from your card pool: Your attack gets +1 damage. Sagat E Commit, discard 1 card from your card pool: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage or any attack gets -1 damage. Only playable if you have more cards in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: When playing a punch attack, kicks in your card pool do not count towards the difficulty of the attack and your punch gets -1 damage. R Commit 1 foundation: When playing a kick attack, punches in your card pool do not count towards the difficulty of the attack and your kick gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if you have more cards in your staging area than your opponent has is their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, Discard 3 momentum: After your opponent cycles their deck, they must remove 5 additional cards from the game. E: Put 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the control of the momentum card discarded to pay this ability's cost. E: Your opponent places the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard pile. Only playable if you have a throw in your card pool. If you have played this ability already this turn, commit this card.

card.name: My Strength is Much Greater than Yours

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: The next {Earth} attack you play this turn gets +1 difficulty and 'Powerful: 2'. R: After your opponent cycles their deck, they must remove 3 additional cards from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in play, your opponent's character is committed and may not ready. During your opponent's ready phase they may discard 1 momentum to destroy this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.While this card is face up in your momentum, each player must commit 1 foundation after their Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). R: After this block successfully blocks a ranged attack, your opponent takes 3 damage.E: Your next {Earth} attack this turn gets -1 difficulty and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you add this card to your momentum, add it face up. R: After either player's ready phase, your opponent discards 1 card from the top of their deck. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is fully blocked it still deals half damage (rounding up). E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent draws 5 cards and then discards 6 cards. If you are playing Zangief you may choose to have your opponent draw 4 cards and then discard 6 cards instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If you add this card to your momentum, add it face up.R: After your opponent draws cards with one of their card effects, they discard the top 3 cards of their deck. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals your momentum. E: Your opponent discards X cards from the top of their deck. X equals half of this attack's damage (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent discards the top 6 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: Foundations committed by this attack's Stun ability or any of your other card effects may not be readied during your opponent's next Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the control check made to play this attack. Zangief E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals your characters handsize.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack (and each copy created by its Multiple ability) gets +X damage. X equals the number of other attacks in your card pool (not including copies of this attack created by its Multiple ability).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If you add this card to your momentum, add it face up. R: After your opponent places 1 or more cards into their discard pile from one of your card effects, they take 2 damage if this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check for a throw attack, that attack gets -2 difficulty. R Commit: After you play a throw attack, your opponent takes 3 damage unless they discard the top 3 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your throw attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's Ready Phase, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations. Zangief R Commit: After your opponent readies a foundation, commit any 1 asset and any 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Reveal the top card of your deck: You may play the revealed card as though it were in your hand until the end of this turn. R Commit 1 foundation: Before you block with this card, change this card's block zone to high or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block a high attack, All mid and high attacks get +2 difficulty as long as this card is in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Look at your opponent's hand. R Commit 1 foundation: Before you block with this card, change this card's block zone to high.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an attack, choose 1 mid block card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Only playable if this is your opponent's third attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Look at the top card of your opponent's deckR Commit 1 foundation: Before you block with this card, change this card's block zone to low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After you take 5 or more damage, All of the attacks in your hand get Reversal until the end of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you take damage from an attack, reduce that damage to 0. This card becomes an exact copy of the attack that dealt damage, redirected at your opponent, with All bonuses played on the original attack included (this attack may be blocked).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add 1 card from the top of your discard pile to your momentum and gain X vitality. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you successfully block an opponent's attack, your opponent must either play an attack or pass as their next action.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, you may only play an attack if the last card in your card pool is not an attack and you may only play a non-attack card if the last card in your card pool is an attack. E: Your attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage. E Commit: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you play a block or an attack, All of your low attacks get Reversal and your opponent may not play high attacks against you for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you block an attack, All of your attacks without blocks may be played as mid blocks with +2 difficulty for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your attacks this turn deal +2 damage if they aren't blocked. Your opponent may play any attack as a Reversal for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). If your last attack was blocked, this card may be played at -2 difficulty and -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Choose a resource symbol. If your opponent attempts to block this attack, foundations with the chosen symbol may not be committed to modify your opponent's control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: After this card deals damage or is blocked, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the last card you played into your card pool is a punch, this attack gets 'Stun: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this card, you may have it replace any attack already in your card pool. Discard the replaced attack. Your opponent may attempt to block this attack normally.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change the attack zone of any mid attack to high.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: While this card is committed your character gets +1 hand size. During your Ready Phase you may choose to leave this card committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check for a character only card or card that has a character ability, that card gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard X momentum: After you take damage, reduce the damage taken by X (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: This foundation adds +2 (instead of +1) when committed to modify a control check. If this foundation is committed to modify a control check for a non-attack card, destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change the attack zone of any mid attack to low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 attack: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the damage of the discarded attack. Only playable if the attack and the discarded card share a resource symbol.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Change the attack zone of any attack to mid.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 attack from your hand: After you take damage, reduce that damage by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Ready your character. E Commit: Your character only attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, Discard X cards from your hand and/or momentum: Your attack is unblockable. X equals the speed of the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you draw a card, discard 2 cards.
